lead_paragraph: Patrick Valenzuela is set to ride again in Southern California for the first time in nearly a year Saturday at Hollywood Park. Valenzuela, 45, has not ridden in Southern California since Nov. 26, 2006, when he broke his ribs after being kicked by his mount at Hollywood Park. He had knee surgery and received clearance from his doctor last month to resume riding.
